item.title: ABBA - Mamma Mia - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Mamma Mia by ABBA from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, C, D, Em, F♯m, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Waterloo by ABBA from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, F, G, G7.
